text: Poruvazhy is a village in Kollam district, Kerala, India. == Worship == The Poruvazhy Peruviruthy Malanada Temple is in this village. == Demographics == India census, Poruvazhy had a population of 27,689 with 13,466 males and 14,223 females. == References == Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Poruvazhy
